## Data Visualization

For these data, I chose to use a scatterplot. This allows the viewer to compare the breastfeeding rates at 12 months to the hospital mPINC score. This is a very simple data visualization example.

```{r}

PercentversusBF2020 <- read.csv("C:/Users/betsy/OneDrive/Desktop/Master's Degree/Statistics/PercentversusBF2020.csv", header=FALSE)

BF.at.12.months <- PercentversusBF2020$V2
mPINC <- PercentversusBF2020$V3

plot(BF.at.12.months, mPINC, main = "Scatterplot without Warnings", col = "blue", pch = 16)

```
